entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
